mapper.html:
Customer Support Response

Dear {{5.customer_name}},

Thank you for contacting our support team regarding: {{5.subject}}

{{6.choices[].message.content}}

If this response doesn't fully address your concern, please reply to this email and we'll have a team member follow up with you personally.

Best regards,
Customer Support Team

Reference ID: {{6.id}} | Status: Auto-Resolved
